data.name: Saurok
data.description:
Saurok

Units:
+3 HP/s regeneration
-30% buy cooldown
-5% hit points
-4 armor

Buildings:
+10% attack rate
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Stasis Ward (2 sec stun, 60 sec ward)
Healing Ward (+9 HP/s for 6 sec)
Serpent Ward (1 ward for 30 sec)

Traits: Savage, primitive and very aggressive Dragon worshiping cult. Utilizes placeable wards instead of true magic spells. Inconsistent and unreliable unit defence which mostly relies on pure luck.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Camouflage Aura
auras.description:
Hides your buildings
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Swiftness Aura
auras.description:
+30% unit move speed
(4500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+8 unit armor
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Chameleon Skin [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Rush Attack

Reduces spell damage to Fleshripper, Tracker, Shaman and Gladiator by 15%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Prowler [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Impale

Prowler replaces Fleshripper
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+4 damage
Abilities:
Hidden Assassin (Passive Skill)
(invisibility and true sight)
(reveals invisible in 900 AoE)
Sunder (Passive Skill)
(20% to reduce armor by 5)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Forged Weapons
Dragonbone Scales
Impale
Rush Attack
Killing Spree
Fast Reflexes
Dragonbone Plates

Type: Anti Armor

units.description:

bonuses.name: Last (or First) Push [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Fast Reflexes

When Fighting Pit hit points drop bellow 10% a massive Lizard will be unleashed.
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can be unleashed manually)
(UW can bypass this skill)

Type: Base Defence / Suicide Run

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Merchant
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

Increases hit points of all your buildings by 2000, armor by 2 and reduces spell damage by 50%.

(can affect mechanical units)

No, seriously, we do hate them!

spells.description:

(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!

You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

towerUpgrades.name: Killing Spree
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate after a kill
Affects: Fleshripper, Tracker, Shaman and Stinger
(affects summoned Protodrakes)

Lv1: +15% attack rate for 15 sec
Lv2: +30% attack rate for 15 sec
Lv3: +45% attack rate for 15 sec
Lv4: +60% attack rate for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Impale
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and stun
Affects: Fleshripper, Gladiator and Turtlepult
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 10% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv2: 20% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv3: 30% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv4: 40% for 2x damage, 1 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Neurotoxin
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and attack slow
Affects: Tracker and Perch Tower
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 5 damage/sec, 5% slow for 15 sec
Lv2: 10 damage/sec, 10% slow for 15 sec
Lv3: 15 damage/sec, 15% slow for 15 sec
Lv4: 20 damage/sec, 20% slow for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Dragonbone Plates
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage block
Affects: All non-Hero Units
(affects summoned Protodrakes)
(affects Ancient Lizard)

Lv1: 5% to block 20 damage
Lv2: 10% to block 40 damage
Lv3: 15% to block 60 damage
Lv4: 20% to block 80 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Bloodbath
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: regeneration after a kill
Affects: Gladiator
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +8 HP/sec in 125 AoE for 15 sec
Lv2: +12 HP/sec in 150 AoE for 15 sec
Lv3: +16 HP/sec in 175 AoE for 15 sec
Lv4: +20 HP/sec in 200 AoE for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Assault Command
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage in 400 AoE
Affects: Gladiator
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +15% damage, -1 armor for 15 sec
Lv2: +30% damage, -3 armor for 15 sec
Lv3: +45% damage, -5 armor for 15 sec
Lv4: +60% damage, -7 armor for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Beast Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: hit points and armor
Affects: Turtlepult
(affects summoned Protodrakes)
(affects Ancient Lizard)

Lv1: +125 HP, +2 armor
Lv2: +250 HP, +4 armor
Lv3: +375 HP, +6 armor
Lv4: +500 HP, +8 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Rush Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: passive attack rate and charge
Affects: Fleshripper

Lv1: +5% attack rate, 20 sec charge CD
Lv2: +10% attack rate, 15 sec charge CD
Lv3: +15% attack rate, 10 sec charge CD
Lv4: +20% attack rate, 5 sec charge CD

towerUpgrades.name: Fast Reflexes
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion
Affects: Fleshripper, Tracker and Shaman
(affects summoned Protodrakes)

Lv1: +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% evasion

skills.name: The Horde - Saurok
skills.description:
Units:
+3 HP/s regeneration
-30% buy cooldown
-5% hit points
-4 armor

Buildings:
+10% attack rate
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Stasis Ward (2 sec stun, 60 sec ward)
Healing Ward (+9 HP/s for 6 sec)
Serpent Ward (1 ward for 30 sec)

Traits: Savage, primitive and very aggressive Dragon worshiping cult. Utilizes placeable wards instead of true magic spells. Inconsistent and unreliable unit defence which mostly relies on pure luck.

Difficulty: Skilled

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

skills.name: Neurotoxin (Lv1)
skills.description:
Deals 5 damage/sec for 15 sec.
Slows attack rate by 5%.

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

heroes.name: Pit Champion
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4 sec stun
(250-400 area of effect)

Iron Punch (Disable Spell)
200-500 damage, 3-6 sec stun
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Regeneration (Self Spell)
300-600 HP over 10 sec

Dragon Hide (Passive Skill)
18-32% to block an attack

heroes.name: Ex Champion
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Bash (Passive Skill)
14-26% to stun for 1.4-2 sec

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
20-26% for 140-200 area damage

Berserk (Self Spell)
100-200% attack rate bonus
(takes 20% extra damage)

Dragon Hide (Passive Skill)
18-32% to block an attack

heroes.name: Dragon Priest
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Flash Fire (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)

Fireball (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

Heat Aura (Disable Aura)
2-8 armor reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Dragon Hide (Passive Skill)
18-32% to block an attack

heroes.name: Storm-Eater
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Dragon's Breath (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area

Electroshock (Damage Spell)
200-350 damage, 20-32% slow
(450-600 area of effect)

Lightning Storm (Damage Spell)
80-100 damage/sec for 12 sec
(300-600 area of effect)

Dragonbone Plates (Passive Skill)
24-30% to block an attack
